meanings.definition: The emission of light resulting from friction, as in the crushing of crystals or the rubbing of sugar cubes together.
meanings.sent1: When I crushed the candy, tiny triboluminescences sparkled in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied triboluminescences by rubbing different materials against each other.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they created triboluminescences by crushing glow sticks.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter lit up the room like a burst of triboluminescences.
meanings.sent5: The magical triboluminescences danced like fireflies in the night.
